message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this valuable product. I believe it would be a great asset to you. I'm asking for $11,500.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate the offer. I understand the value of the product and am willing to pay up to $10,000 for it.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your position, $10,000 is a bit too low for me.  Could you do $11,000? I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I am still interested in the product, but I can only agree to a price of $10,500.
